SELECT cpi.id id, cpi.comm_title commTitle, lsq.spec_name specName, CONCAT( IF ( TIMESTAMPDIFF( MONTH, DATE_FORMAT( NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ), max( oi.valid_end_date )) != 0, TIMESTAMPDIFF( MONTH, DATE_FORMAT( NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ), max( oi.valid_end_date )), '不足一' ), '个月' ) valid, max( oi.valid_start_date ) validStartDate, max( oi.valid_end_date ) validEndDate FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN comm_pub_info cpi ON cpi.id = oi.comm_pub_id LEFT JOIN level_spec_quote lsq ON lsq.id = oi.level_spec_id WHERE oi.del_flag = '0' AND oi.order_state_type = '4' AND oi.valid_end_date > NOW() AND oi.buyer_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} GROUP BY oi.buyer_id, oi.comm_pub_id ORDER BY oi.valid_start_date DESC

select SUM(CASE WHEN oi.order_state_type = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) paymentCount, SUM(CASE WHEN oi.order_state_type = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) completCount, SUM(CASE WHEN oi.order_state_type = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) cancelCount from order_info oi where oi.order_state_type != '1' and oi.seller_id = #{sellerId} group by oi.seller_id

select max(t_.day_ord_count) dayOrdCount, max(t_.day_sales) daySales, max(t_.yesterday_sales) yesterdaySales, max(t_.nearly_sevev_sales) nearlySevevSales from( select count(oi.id) day_ord_count, 0 day_sales, 0 yesterday_sales, 0 nearly_sevev_sales from order_info oi where oi.seller_id = #{sellerId} and oi.refer_ord_date > #{startDate} and oi.refer_ord_date < #{endDate} UNION ALL select 0 day_ord_count, ROUND(sum(oi.amount_payable), 2) day_sales, 0 yesterday_sales, 0 nearly_sevev_sales from order_info oi where oi.seller_id = #{sellerId} and oi.pay_ord_date > #{startDate} and oi.pay_ord_date < #{endDate} group by DATE_FORMAT(oi.pay_ord_date, '%Y-%m-%d') UNION ALL select 0 day_ord_count, 0 day_sales, ROUND(sum(oi.amount_payable), 2) yesterday_sales, 0 nearly_sevev_sales from order_info oi where oi.seller_id = #{sellerId} and oi.pay_ord_date > #{yesterStartDate} and oi.pay_ord_date < #{yesterEndDate} group by DATE_FORMAT(oi.pay_ord_date, '%Y-%m-%d') UNION ALL select 0 day_ord_count, 0 day_sales, 0 yesterday_sales, ROUND(sum(oi.amount_payable), 2) nearly_sevev_sales from order_info oi where oi.seller_id = #{sellerId} and oi.pay_ord_date > #{startTime} and oi.pay_ord_date < #{endTime} group by DATE_FORMAT(oi.pay_ord_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ) t_
SELECT * FROM order_info WHERE 1 = 1 AND (order_state_type = '0' AND NOW() > pay_dead_line_date)

select max(t_.memb_count) dayCount, max(t_.yesterday_count) yesterdayCount, max(t_.mounth_count) monthCount, max(t_.total_count) totalCount from( select count(mi.id) memb_count, 0 yesterday_count, 0 mounth_count, 0 total_count from memb_info mi where del_flag = '0' and mi.create_date > #{startDate} and mi.create_date < #{endDate} UNION ALL select 0 memb_count, count(mi.id) yesterday_count, 0 mounth_count, 0 total_count from memb_info mi where del_flag = '0' and mi.create_date > #{yesterDate} and mi.create_date < #{yesterEndDate} UNION ALL select 0 memb_count, 0 yesterday_count, count(mi.id) mounth_count, 0 total_count from memb_info mi where del_flag = '0' and mi.create_date > #{monthDate} and mi.create_date < #{monthDateEnd} UNION ALL select 0 memb_count, 0 yesterday_count, 0 mounth_count, count(mi.id) total_count from memb_info mi where del_flag = '0' ) t_

SELECT #{sellerId} sellerId, COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(oi.create_date, '%Y-%m') THEN oi.id END) thisMonthOrderCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(oi.create_date, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m') THEN oi.id END) lastMonthOrderCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN YEARWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(oi.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(NOW()) THEN oi.id END) thisWeekOrderCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN YEARWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(oi.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(NOW()) - 1 THEN oi.id END) lastWeekOrderCount FROM order_info oi WHERE oi.create_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 2 MONTH) AND NOW()
AND oi.seller_id = #{sellerId}

SELECT #{sellerId} sellerId, IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(oi.create_date, '%Y-%m') THEN oi.amount_payable END), 2), 0) thisMonthOrderAmoun, IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(oi.create_date, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m') THEN oi.amount_payable END), 2), 0) lastMonthOrderAmoun, IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN YEARWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(oi.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(NOW()) THEN oi.amount_payable END), 2), 0) thisWeekOrderAmoun, IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN YEARWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(oi.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(NOW()) - 1 THEN oi.amount_payable END), 2), 0) lastWeekOrderAmoun FROM order_info oi WHERE oi.create_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 2 MONTH) AND NOW()
AND oi.seller_id = #{sellerId}

SELECT oi.valid_end_date,cpi.login_type FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN comm_pub_info cpi on cpi.id = oi.comm_pub_id WHERE oi.del_flag = '0' AND oi.buyer_id = #{userId} AND cpi.login_type = #{loginType} GROUP BY oi.buyer_id, oi.comm_pub_id ORDER BY oi.valid_start_date DESC
